DEFINING.Definition: showing or reflecting its character, very important

SNARLING.Definition: making aggressive or angry sounds with the mouth open

WHISTLES.Definition: sounds made by forcing breath through a small hole between almost closed lips or teeth

CAPE.Definition: a type of coat without sleeves that falls loosely over the shoulders

RISES UP.Definition: moves his body in a higher position

UNSTEADY.Definition: not stable, as if it's ready to fall

TRAIL.Definition: a series of blood marks, path

WRITHING.Definition: twisting or turning its body in pain

BLADE.Definition: a thin sharp edge used for cutting

BOWS.Definition: bends his body forward as a way of expressing thanks

DOTTED.Definition: being in various random spots, scattered

CATTLE.Definition: the group of animals that includes cows, buffalo and bison

AGGRESSIVE.Definition: behaving in an angry and violent way

DART.Definition: small thin object with a sharp point

RISING UP.Definition: moving his body in a higher position

REACTIONARY.Definition: opposite to new ideas and change
